introduce.title: What is Seedance 2.0
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Seedance 2.0 is ByteDance's cutting-edge multimodal AI video generation model, supporting both text-to-video and image-to-video creation with stunning cinematic quality.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us for support.

items.question: What is Seedance 2.0?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 is ByteDance's next-generation multimodal AI video generation model. It supports both text-to-video and image-to-video creation, producing cinematic-quality videos with natural motion and stunning visual effects.

items.question: What types of videos can I create?
items.answer: You can create a wide variety of videos including promotional content, social media clips, artistic animations, product demonstrations, and more. The model supports various styles from realistic to artistic.

items.question: How does text-to-video work?
items.answer: Simply describe your desired video scene in text, and Seedance 2.0 will generate a matching video with natural motion, appropriate lighting, and cinematic quality. The AI understands context, actions, and visual aesthetics.

items.question: Can I animate existing images?
items.answer: Yes! With image-to-video functionality, you can upload static images and transform them into dynamic videos. The AI adds realistic motion, camera movements, and scene animations while preserving the original image style.

items.question: What video quality can I expect?
items.answer: Seedance 2.0 produces cinematic-quality videos with professional-grade aesthetics. The output features film-like visual quality, smooth motion, and stunning effects suitable for professional use.

items.question: How long does video generation take?
items.answer: Generation time varies based on video length and complexity. Typically, creating a short video clip takes just a few seconds to minutes, thanks to optimized AI processing.
